original_text: At this time, the Lord gave a message to a prophet who belonged to a group of prophets. He told the prophet to say to one of his friends, ‘Hit me with your stick.’ But his friend refused to do it.
korean_text: 선지자의 무리 중 한 사람이 여호와의 말씀을 그의 친구에게 이르되 너는 나를 치라 하였더니 그 사람이 치기를 싫어하는지라

sentences.original_text: At this time, the Lord gave a message
to a prophet who belonged to a group of prophets
He told the prophet to say
But his friend refused to do it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 친구는 그렇게 하기를 거부했습니다
